alert.note: Alert for Mills; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 8:21PM CDT until April 12 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MILLS...SOUTHWESTERN POTTAWATTAMIE...SARPY...EAST CENTRAL LANCASTER...NORTHWESTERN OTOE...DOUGLAS...SOUTHEASTERN SAUNDERS AND CASS COUNTIES... At 821 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Fort Calhoun to 5 miles south of Elmwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Council Bluffs, Weeping Water, Underwood, Avoca and Nehawka. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
